body.p:
Flemingsburg Ky
April 25th 1861
Gov B Magoffin
My dear sir
Accompaning this you will be presented with a petition signed by a number as you will see of our very best Citizens asking Executive Clemency in behalf of Patrick Oyers

The facts governing the case are fully stated in the petition I heard all the proof which was produced before the Jury and was satisfeid then and am still of the opinion that it was not the intention of Pat to steal

I would be glad to know that in view of all the facts you had thought proper to give him a prompt discharge Knowing it would meet the aprobation of the entire Community as all say he ought to be pardoned with sentiments of high regard I have the honor to be
